CustomField.formula: IF( LEN(TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)))>1 ,TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)),"0" + TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)))+ "-" + IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)))>1 ,TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)),"0" +TEXT( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5)))+ "-"+ TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 5))
CustomField.label: Fecha Creaci√≥n 5 dias
